Function Details [hide private]

make_one_liner(script)

source code  

Returns command to execute python script as a one-line python program

e.g. 

    import os
    script = '''
    import os
    print os.path.exists('hi')
    '''
    os.system(make_one_liner(script))

Will print out:

    <module 'os' from ...>
    False
